actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to require that statistical data and Federal benefits provided to a standard metropolitan statistical area be provided to the same extent to certain designated statistical areas under revised criteria of the Department of Commerce for designating such areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: States that if the Secretary of Commerce revises the criteria for determining standard metropolitan statistical areas, Federal agencies shall collect data on, and provide benefits to, such revised areas to the same extent as such services were performed for standard areas prior to such revision.

titles.title: A bill to require that statistical data and Federal benefits provided to a standard metropolitan statistical area be provided to the same extent to certain designated statistical areas under revised criteria of the Department of Commerce for designating such areas, and for other purposes.
